script:
if not exist "C:\Space\" mkdir "c:\Space\"
if not exist "C:\Space\!My Files" mkdir "c:\Space\!My Files\"
rmdir "C:\Space\Legacy Files" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Scripts\NEW PRODUCTS & 2B" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Data" /S /Q

robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\!My Files" "C:\Space\!My Files" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /XO

robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Data Prep Tool" "C:\Space\Data Prep Tool" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Charts" C:\Space\Charts /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
rem robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Cloud" C:\Space\Cloud /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge

rem robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Efficiency Toolbar" "C:\Space\Efficiency Toolbar" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
rmdir "C:\Space\Efficiency Toolbar"
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\zEfficiency Toolbar" "C:\Space\Efficiency Toolbar" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge

robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Highlights" C:\Space\Highlights /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Labels" C:\Space\Labels /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Layouts" C:\Space\Layouts /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Scripts" C:\Space\Scripts /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Property Lists" "C:\Space\Property Lists" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Tables" C:\Space\Tables /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Top Mix" "C:\Space\Top Mix" /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\BatchPC" C:\Space\BatchPC /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /E /purge
@echo off

pause
exit
